statements: DELETE FROM financial_processes WHERE process_id = 100 AND status = 'completed';
DELETE FROM financial_processes WHERE process_id = 200 AND amount > 500;
DELETE FROM financial_accounts WHERE account_type = 'Savings' AND balance < 0;
DELETE FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit' AND amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM financial_accounts WHERE balance < 0 OR account_type = 'Credit';
DELETE FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_type = 'Credit';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
